channel.title: RDS on Modernization workshop
channel.description: Recent content in RDS on Modernization workshop

item.title: Application Modernization with Cisco Appdynamics
item.description: Learn how Appdynamics Observability can help you apply modernization strategies that keep your digital-first organization moving at speed, ensure operational optimization, avoid unnecessary risks, and maximize your innovation

item.title: .Net Core Container Secrets
item.description: In this module, you will learn how to containerize an existing .Net application and implement modern cloud based security principles to secure your application in production.
